metadata.title: CVE-2020-15962 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient policy validation in serial in Google Chrome prior to85.0.4183.121 allowed a remote attacker to potentially perform out ofbounds memory access via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
